snippet.title: Beholder: Conductor | Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Beholder: Conductor is thrilling new spin-off in the Beholder series, where you step into the role of a senior conductor on the legendary Determination Bringer train, tasked with monitoring passengers, enforcing strict regulations, and completing high-stakes Ministry assignments that could determine their future. As you progress, the stakes grow higher, and you’ll move up the train to serve in the dining car and VIP compartments. Will you remain loyal to your mission, or will temptation guide you off course?

Wishlist now on Steam: https://s.team/a/2825530
Follow Beholder on Twitter: https://x.com/Beholder_Game
Follow Alawar on Twitter: https://x.com/alawarteam
Join our Discord server:  https://discord.gg/alawar
